mapper.insert: insert into DM_STATION_B (UNID, UNAME, LNAME, LTEL, ADDRESS, CREATER, MODIFYER, CREATEDATE, MODIFYDATE, AREACODE,ACCOUNT,LNG,LAT,AREANAME) values (#{unid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ltel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifydate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{areaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update DM_STATION_B set UNAME = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LNAME = #{lname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LTEL = #{ltel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFYER = #{modifyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFYDATE = #{modifydate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREACODE = #{areacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LNG = #{lng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAT = #{lat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREANAME = #{areaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where UNID = #{unid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select UNID, UNAME, LNAME, LTEL, ADDRESS, CREATER, MODIFYER, CREATEDATE, MODIFYDATE, AREACODE,ACCOUNT,LNG,LAT,AREANAME from DM_STATION_B where UNID = #{unid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select UNID, UNAME,LNG,LAT from DM_STATION_B ORDER BY UNID DESC
